data.title: Session
data.meta_description: We need pro bono help for our  project on Taproot Plus. Learn more about the project here!
data.text:
I have a very bare bones website for the Hudson Scholars program and I am looking to upgrade: http://sites.hackleyschool.org/hudsonscholars/

I'd love to have a brainstorming session with an expert who could help me come up with a plan on what is needed to improve the website. Some preliminary thoughts I have about this new website: more photos, a calendar, a place to access forms, and overall a more visually appealing and user friendly website.

A functioning, useful, user friendly, and visually appealing website would greatly improve communication between our program and the students and their families. This could streamline a lot of our communications and save a lot of time. In addition, it could help to create a stronger sense of community/identity within the Hudson Scholars as a central hub (and maybe a point of pride :)
